.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-fb {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -50px -50px;
}

.sprite-icon-basket {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -162px -50px;
}

.sprite-icon-check-off2 {
    width: 23px;
    height: 23px;
    background-position: -277px -50px;
}

.sprite-icon-check-on2 {
    width: 27px;
    height: 23px;
    background-position: -50px -173px;
}

.sprite-icon-circle {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    background-position: -177px -173px;
}

.sprite-icon-circle-dot {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    background-position: -302px -173px;
}

.sprite-icon-down-dir {
    width: 11px;
    height: 10px;
    background-position: -50px -298px;
}

.sprite-icon-up-dir {
    width: 11px;
    height: 10px;
    background-position: -161px -298px;
}

.sprite-inst {
    width: 21px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -272px -298px;
}

.sprite-vk {
    width: 26px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -400px -50px;
}
